subject: Order details
description_text:
Hello, are you able to give an update on my order. 

Order #SSN4650
When i ordered the shifter, the website stated that shipping would begin December 15th. My order status is still just saying confirmed. Any update would be greatly appreciated. Thanks

Robbie Cook

conversations.body_text: Hi Robbie Cook,    The 2-in-1 shifter will start shipping from today. There has been a slight adjustment to the delivery schedule due to changes in some components.

Ok, thanks for the update.
Robbie Cook


>
